name: Christina Diamond
text: I ordered 2 breads, 2 pizzas, and an Italian sub. The bread and pizza are good, typical Howie food. The sub inedible. Im going to try to upload pictures. The whole top of it is falling apart. I can't even pick it up.

name: S. U.
text: A very convenient and local home town pizzeria. The staff is always friendly and helpful. Plus they have a lot of really great specials! We received a large 2 topping pizza with a large chef salad for only $16.95 tax included. And it was tasty, hot and fresh. I heartily recommend this Hungry Howie's!
